snippet: The frosted acrylic components are assembled around a frosted glass tube with a three-watt LED at its center.
abstract: New York designer David Nosanchuk introduces the N1R table lamp, which features frosted acrylic components assembled around a three-watt LED light.
lead_paragraph: The frosted acrylic components are assembled around a frosted glass tube with a three-watt LED at its center.

headline.seo: The N1R Table Lamp by David Nosanchuk
headline.main: Puzzle Solved, and a Lamp Is Born
headline.print_headline: Puzzle Solved, and a Lamp Is Born
